data.message: more like misleeders.  lets see.. sneakers, hoodie.. baseball cap.. adidas.. yep.. you're still stuck in the 7th grade.  is that when you started smoking the good shit?  that makes sense.. well, at least you're RICH right?  everything you say you hate.. yep-- keep attacking the Christians on the right.. because they did "what?" to you?  oh because your master told you to-- oh yeah, never mind (wow)
